title: HELPPP MAC CLIENT PROBLEM
body: so basically i cant launch league on my mac 10.7. i re-dowloaded it and when i hit the "launch" button it makes the noise and disappears. i need HELP ASAP PLEASEEE!!!!!!!

replies.body: It sounds like when you re-downloaded League, your Mac wasn't able to carry over the old admin settings you previously had setup. You should be able to get those back to how they were by following this [**Mac administrator settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), but feel free to reach back out to me if needed!
I made my account as admin, but when i loaded the client up it still wont do anything after i hit launch

and i also have privilege to "read and write" for the application. Ive downloaded the hextech repair tool aswell, but unfortunately when i open it it spawns outside of the screen and can barely see it. I cant move or see it at all! I guess im just very unlucky today

Hmmmm strange. I'd like to go ahead and get you a little more detailed help, as Mac's aren't *quite* my specialty. Reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and you'll be in great hands there!
